The Clans
The Clans of the origional Dragonriders of Prexus were composed of family members with like skills and abilities i.e. Gold and Silver Clans were mostly casters, Blue clan was Tanks, Warriors and Shadow Knights, Green Clan were Healers, etc.Etc. The family members naturally gravitated toward others of like interests. Unfortunately The Clans have not yet rebuilt to a point where this is a practical option. Therefore each new member will be assigned to a Clan randomly so as to balance the size of the Clans.
The Guild is devided into Six Clans folowing the plan of the origional Dragonriders. Each Clan has a Leader who is an officer in the Guild. The Clan Leaders form the Council of Elders who represent the individual members of their Clans. The Council of Elders is lead by the Guild Leader. There are also other Guild Officers who are appionted buy the Guild Leader as needed.
While the Guild would encourage the members speak with their Clan Leader regarding problems complaints etc. It is important for all members to know they may exercise their freedom of speech at any Guild meeting.We are all family, and family has a right to speak and be heard by all.
